content.question: The slope field for a certain differential equation is shown above. Which of the following could be the particular solution to the differential equation satisfying <math alttext="y of 0, equals 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="y equals, negative cosine x plus 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="y equals, e raised to the x squared power, minus 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="y equals, negative cosine x plus 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Identify a re-expression of mathematical information presented in a given representation
